lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because:
"Be generous in prosperity, and thankful in adversity. Be worthy of the trust of thy neighbor, and look upon him with a bright and friendly face. Be a treasure to the poor, an admonisher to the rich, an answerer of the cry of the needy, a preserver of the sanctity of thy pledge. Be fair in thy judgment, and guarded in thy speech. Be unjust to no man, and show all meekness to all men. Be as a lamp unto them that walk in darkness, a joy to the sorrowful, a sea for the thirsty, a haven for the distressed, an upholder and defender of the victim of oppression. Let integrity and uprightness distinguish all thine acts. Be a home for the stranger, a balm to the suffering, a tower of strength for the fugitive. Be eyes to the blind, and a guiding light unto the feet of the erring. Be an ornament to the countenance of truth, a crown to the brow of fidelity, a pillar of the temple of righteousness, a breath of life to the body of mankind, an ensign of the hosts of justice, a luminary above the horizon of virtue, a dew to the soil of the human heart, an ark on the ocean of knowledge, a sun in the heaven of bounty, a gem on the diadem of wisdom, a shining light in the firmament of thy generation, a fruit upon the tree of humility."

-Bahá'u'lláh

lenders.name: Deep
lenders.occupational_info:
The pioneer of online travel in India, Deep Kalra founded MakeMyTrip in April, 2000. Drawing on his experience from his years at GE Capital, AMF Bowling Inc. and ABN AMRO Bank, under his stewardship, MakeMyTrip has become the largest online travel company, as well as the largest e-commerce business in India.

Deep is a member of the Executive Council of NASSCOM and chairs the NASSCOM Internet Working Group. He is also a Charter Member of TiE (The Indus Entrepreneurs) and serves on the Board of TiE, New Delhi. Deep is also a member of CII's Tourism sub-committee and a regular speaker at numerous internet and travel conferences across the world. He currently serves as an independent Director for IndiaMart.com, a leading B2B website. Deep is also a founding member of “I am Gurgaon”, an NGO focused on the improving the quality of life in Gurgaon.

Deep holds a Bachelor's degree in Economics from St. Stephen's College, Delhi (1990), and a MBA (PGDM) degree from the Indian Institute of Management, Ahmedabad (1992). His interests include adventure sports, swimming, yoga, quizzing and travelling to places off the beaten path

Our mission is to bring the concept of “responsible business” into everyday business practice by helping current and future business leaders:

-- Understand the intersection of social and financial objectives for mutual benefit.

-- Stay current on trends and issues in the responsible business realm
-- Develop a career network within the responsible business scope

1) Feels good

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
I understand what it is like to try and function with limited means and the value of help from another that might have a little extra capital to share and help one overcome that barrier to achieve greater things.  I also understand that as an American, I have the opportunity to help others that have much less to work with.  

I'm excited to see what comes of helping others through Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and build websites for state government agencies in the state of Minnesota, United States of America.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: I want to see women succeed.

lenders.name: John & Regina Zdravich
lenders.loan_because: Realizing  how fortunate we are, and having endured tough times ourselves (our real estate business failed), we realize it is important to help, and even a little bit can make a difference.  We have given to relatives in Serbia, our local Humane Society and women's shelter, and the Unity Foundation - a LaPorte County Indiana organization that helps charitable causes. We were intrigued by Kiva, and decided to participate. This is just a great way to help make a real difference for someone.
lenders.occupational_info: Regina is the in-house accountant for a machine shop, and John is obtaining his teaching license.

lenders.name: Steve Heuwagen
lenders.loan_because: It's just the right thing to do.

lenders.loan_because: it matters.

~

~

So I feel blessed by the lord God for giving me the opportunity to give back to the community.

lenders.name: Amy

lenders.name: Molly Ayn

lenders.name: THEKID
lenders.loan_because:
Our mission is to improve and secure the future of humanity (THEKIDZ). We aim to protect the welfare and being of the future from physical, mental, and sexual abuse. Through awareness, persistence and a constant presence WE CAN BREAK THE CYCLE!
  We will secure the future by educating with the knowledge of what hasn't worked in the past; and work together on formulating a future plan that works humanely and environmentally. Implementing all the wisdom, scientific, and technological advancements at our disposal to guarantee the success of the future. IT'S TIME TO CHANGE, AND UNITED WE WILL MAKE THE DIFFERENCE AND IMPROVE THE FUTURE OF HUMANITY!
lenders.occupational_info: Improving the security of the future of humanity!

lenders.name: Moving Boxes Made Green
lenders.loan_because: I feel every company should feel the social responsibility to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I rent re-usable moving boxes to people to not only make their moving experience easier, but to also reduce their carbon footprint.  In return for their business, for every client who uses me I lend $25 to another entrepreneur so they can come closer to their goals and dreams.
